title: Buddha Lounge
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Makes both Indian and Thai food with more vegan possibilities amongst the Thai dishes. The generous portions allow for sharing on both starters and main courses. Starters include lentil soup, vegetable pakora, and vegetable spring rolls. Mains include aloo bobi, aloo jera, vegetable stir fried rice, vegetable or tofu pad Thai, vegetarian Thai noodle soup, and a tofu curry.
